column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Seating was a little challenging since we were a party of five and it was very busy. After some deliberation
column2: we ended up outside with a couple of tables pushed together. Initially
column3: we were in a very awkward spot (right near the exit gate for the restaurant)
column5: a group finished up and we managed to snag a spot under an umbrella. The staff were very helpful in helping us push together tables
column6: so we were grateful for that.
